name: Delay Dragon
description:
Delay Dragon is a game about shooting fireballs to traverse an erupting volcano. 
You must rescue your eggs, but there is a wall of lava coming for them (and you). 
You can use your fireballs to delay the lava, but it is inevitable that it will reach them.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 50 (Compo) in 48 hours.
All assets in the game (art, code, sound, music) was made by me during this time.

Ludum Dare Page:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/delay-dragon

The source code/project file is available here:
https://dindotjs.itch.io/delay-dragon-source-code

Controls

A/D to move
Space to jump
Shift to shoot fireball
WASD to aim fireball
R to reload
